title: Mordekaiser's new ultimate looks awesome in all the right ways, but
body:
How will it look for his teammates? Does effects like Karthus ult and Soraka ult reach his "mirror world"? How does spectating work? Can allies still see pings from Mordekaiser or his victim?

Is this going to encourage full attack speed crit mordekaiser?

replies.body: Poppy 2.0: return of the low counterplay.
The problem with Poppy's ult was that she could just ignore her target and bludgeon every other person on your team to death. At least Morde is locked into an actual 1v1.

> Poppy 2.0: return of the low counterplay.

Return of the learn to position or die aka noob killer 2011
Rename it to upside down or shadow realm instead of death Realm. You take yourselves too seriously Riot.

Morde is a juggernaut with that rework and he got Free Magic pen% on his E (Up to 25%). Pretty sure he will have only AP ratios (maybe some AD ones for Gunblade like Akali ?).

No matter the build, being a juggernaut means : Gotta reach you to murder you and his tools for it aren't that strong (Illaoi and Darius are great examples of Juggernaut imo)
to be exact hes a AP darius similar to his E passive Pen.
